system.effect: A Nuclear Weapon. ~2.5-5km destruction radius. Can be fired from a projectile-firing macrocannon, doing 1d5+4 hits of 1d10+6 damage (always combine damage totals into single hit salvo). Might destroy a ship or station if detonated inside. Poor: 1d5+2 hits, Good: 1d5+5, Best: 10.
